vlive.korean: 응! 너무 잘해줘서 곤란할 정도야. No! They're actually too nice. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <시(詩)스토리> 9화 거짓말 (Poetic Story Ep 9: lies)
사실 많이 곤란할 때가 좀 있어요. There are times when it's difficult. 듣기 View video 셀럽티비(Celuv.TV) : 칼군무, 퍼포먼스! B.A.P 함께 HANDS UP!

vlive.korean: 네. 저 되게 미식가에요. - 되게 곤란할 거 같은데. Yes. I'm an epicure. - Then it'd be very difficult. 듣기 View video DSPmedia : [디.훈.소_8탄] 목요일은 '찬익'이가 요리사~♪ (Feat. 짜파구리)

vlive.korean: 회식하는데 전화받으면 곤란할 수 있거든. It might be hard to answer his phone when he's dining out. 듣기 View video WINNER : 승승TV Ep.5.5 <위너빵 타이쿤>
vlive.english: It might be hard to answer his phone when he's dining out.

vlive.korean: 이렇게 너무 단체 접속하셔서 아까부터 막 하시면 곤란 할 수가 있거든요. Please don't login as a group and do these things. 듣기 View video 10PM : 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news

examples.korean: My sister is having problems, and I’ d like to help her, but I don’ t want her to think that I’ m meddling. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 언니가 곤란할 때 도와주고 싶지만, 언니 쪽에서 내가 참견한다고 생각하는 것은 싫다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
